name: Super Greedy Cat
description:
Help King Meow to travel the world to find it's missing gold coin!


Super Greedy Cat is a platformer where you explore different level with multiple enemies.
Do specific challenge to collect Stars at the end of the levels.
Each coin gives you a speed boost during 2 seconds which can be cumulated 10 times.

Key Features of version 1.0.0:

  • 20 level campaign
  • Steam leaderbard
  • Steam achievements
  • 60 Challenges

Roadmap:

  • Level editor
